data.name: Super Turbo Sudoku Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to "Super Turbo Sudoku"!

The demo of the game includes 5 Levels, each of them having a different difficulties.

The full version includes 90 Levels with 6 different difficulties! Furthermore it has a Level Editor and a Sudoku Solver.

Enjoy!

data.short_description: Welcome to "Super Turbo Sudoku"! The demo of the game includes 5 Levels, each of them having a different difficulties. The full version includes 90 Levels with 6 different difficulties! Furthermore it has a Level Editor and a Sudoku Solver. Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
